sentence: They include Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger.
author: Brett Pulley
title: Stacey Abrams and Voting-Rights Allies Spurn Biden's Atlanta Events

sentence: Six weeks later, state law enforcement officials under the authority of then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp arrested Miss Dennard at her home four days before Christmas.
title: 'It's time for a history lesson': Georgia Democrat refuses to idly let GOP suppress the vote
